# Main game loop
running = True
while running:

            running = False
        else:

                game.run()

    # Render to screen
    renderer.render_background()
    game.render_elements()  # Ensure this method is implemented in the Game class

    # Update display and maintain frame rate
    pygame.display.flip()
    clock.tick(60)

# Clean up and quit
